overview: After an encounter on a subway train, an anxious, troubled man named Danny visits his therapist, Walt. Walt, the therapist, seemingly the perfect man living the perfect life, struggles with his own dissatisfaction for with his life, which he obscures in order to fix the problems of others. While both men seem to come from two separate ends of the spectrum, we realize they both have more in common with each other than first thought.
tagline: Walt, the therapist, seemingly the perfect man living the perfect life, struggles with his own dissatisfaction for with his life, which he obscures in order to fix the problems of others.
title: Vices
